8.0: He has [assets] and doesn't want to support himself - from his own [assets] but rather only from Tzedaka and he afflicts himself with hunger

10.2: For it is forbidden from a positive commandment - "So shall you bless" (Numbers 6). You [priests] and not non-priests. And a negative commandment that comes from a positive commandment is [called] a positive commandment.

0.1: For twice in a week- it is discussing the maiden.
0.0: It is an establishment of the Rabanan that you marry a besula on Wednesday, like the Gemara will explain later on.

0.1: For it is written-During the war of Shaul and your brothers etc. and David learned from his father Jesse to even lead [properly] like this when going out to war
0.0: He would write a bill of divorce for his wife- For if he died in war the bill would take effect retroactively from the day it was written-And it happened that Uriah [the Hittite] died in war.
